org.apache.struts2.tiles

Class StrutsTilesContainerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tiles.factory.AbstractTilesContainerFactory
      • org.apache.tiles.factory.BasicTilesContainerFactory
        • org.apache.struts2.tiles.StrutsTilesContainerFactory

  • public class StrutsTilesContainerFactory
extends org.apache.tiles.factory.BasicTilesContainerFactory
    Dedicated Struts factory to build Tiles container with support for: - Freemarker - I18N using Struts resource bundles - S2 ro access Struts' ValueStack - OGNL - EL If you need additional features create your own listener and factory, you can base on code from Tiles' CompleteAutoloadTilesContainerFactory
